Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Pedometer \Pe*dom"e*ter\, n. [Pedi-, pedo- + -meter: cf. F. p['e]dom[`e]tre.] (Mech.) An instrument for including the number of steps in walking, and so ascertaining the distance passed over. It is usually in the form of a watch; an oscillating weight by the motion of the body causes the index to advance a certain distance at each step. [1913 Webster]
pedometer n : measuring instrument for recording the number of steps taken in walking
